settings.title: _FEATURED brand MagnaReady
settings.image2_text: Inspired by her husband’s struggle to button his shirt as a result of Parkinson’s, Maura Horton came up with the brilliant idea to magnetically infuse the buttons on his shirts, creating a product that could restore order to his daily routine and confidence.
settings.featured_text: Honoring him (her husband) is the best thing I can do in this world” maura horton

settings.text: MOMA: NEW AGING MOMA’s Director of R+D Paola Antonelli explores the topic of New Aging and what it means to age today. Is it a new form of youth for some? What are the social, psychological,aesthetic and ethical implications?
THE DANDELION SHIFT In this TedTalk, Laura Whitaker, Executive Director of disabilities program ESP (Extra Special People), encourages us to see the ability in disability.

settings.title: ENDING PARKINSON’S DISEASE: A PRESCRIPTION FOR ACTION
settings.product_by: by by Ray Dorsey & Todd Sherer & Michael S Okun & Bastiaan R Bloem
settings.text:
Four top experts provide a plan
to help prevent Parkinson’s,
improve care and treatment,
and end silence associated
with this devastating disease.

optimism and kindness can
help you live to 100.
